title: Classic 6 Huge (4BDr/3Bath Full Service Pre - War WD)
posting_body: ['This magnificent 4Bedrooms and 3 bath apartment in Classic pre-war full service building in the heart of the Upper West Side.', 'Size is about 2,400 square feet and has a large entry foyer with a two entry closets.', 'Kitchen will be fully renovated with all brand new with stainless steel appliances, microwave & dishwasher,', 'customized marble countertops, ample storage space, and gorgeous slate tiled floors and white wood cabinetry.', 'Spacious living room with a fireplace, north which provides good natural light and gorgeous city views.', 'Off the living area and through charming French doors is a formal dining room.', 'Well sized bedrooms including a Master bedroom with multiple closets and Primary bath in suite.', 'The fourth bedroom can be used as a guest room, nanny room or home office,  and has an en-suite bathroom.', 'decent closet space and charming hardwood floors throughout the apartment.', 'High ceilings with fine pre-war crown moldings.', 'Spacious pantry off the kitchen with washer & dryer.', 'Close to the subway and just minutes walking from to Central Park.', 'Located between Riverside Park and Central Park, the Upper West Side has gained for providing a laid-back, easygoing lifestyle within NYC.', 'Stunning Art-Deco architecture  help give the area its distinctively sophisticated surrounding']
